meanings.definition: Subteens: the age group between childhood and adolescence, typically referring to individuals aged 10-12.
meanings.sent1: During the school play, the subteens showed their acting skills.
meanings.sent2: The subteens in the neighborhood enjoy playing basketball together.
meanings.sent3: At the birthday party, the subteens tried to act like grown-ups.
meanings.sent4: The subteens blossomed into confident individuals during the school year.
meanings.sent5: In the park, the subteens ran around with boundless energy.

meanings.definition: Subteens: individuals who are younger than teenagers but older than children.
meanings.sent1: The subteens giggled at the funny movie they watched together.
meanings.sent2: During the camping trip, the subteens helped set up the tents.
meanings.sent3: The subteens pretended to be secret agents on a mission in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, the subteens were like a bridge between childhood and adolescence.
meanings.sent5: The subteens eagerly awaited the upcoming school dance.
